name: Escape PS1 Hagrid
description:
The game is split into 3 chapters including survival-horror, platforming, fighting (one-sided tho) and a boss fight. This game is a parody of the popular fantasy franchise and not to be taken seriously.

System requirements

CPU Dual Core or better

GPU 512MB VRAM or more

RAM 2GB

200mb HDD space

Controls:
  • WASD move
  • CTRL crouch
  • Mouse look around
  • E interact
  • LMB attack
  • ESC back to menu
